## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e1ccc75f6c2f9d6992a881b3697726ce7fa059fa656a4cdc39065c02888ba2cb)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'label-merge-conflicts-action' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
